LanguageData.CaravanRaidDialogue: You have received information of a caravan from {0} that has set up camp nearby. Now would be a good time to raid it, but be aware that caravans are usually guarded.
LanguageData.WantedDialogue: {0} has put up a bounty for {PAWN_nameDef}, a most vile criminal with many atrocities under {PAWN_possessive} name. {PAWN_nameDef} from {1} is wanted for {2} silver if delivered dead, double if delivered alive to one of {0}'s settlements.
LanguageData.WantedTurnInDescDead: Turn in the corpse of {PAWN_nameDef} for a reward.
LanguageData.WantedTurnInDescAlive: Turn in the criminal {PAWN_nameDef} for a reward.
LanguageData.WantedTurnInMessageDead: You've turned in the corpse of {PAWN_nameDef} for {0} silver.
LanguageData.WantedTurnInMessageAlive: You've turned in criminal {PAWN_nameDef} alive for {0} silver.
LanguageData.Chemsined: Should muffalo go for your chemshine: {0}
LanguageData.ProtectionFeeDialogue:
A band of thugs sent by {0} call you from nearby. 

 They offer to keep your colony safe from any threats, even the ones potentially caused by them, as long as you pay a fee of {1} silver. 

 Be warned - refusal can anger the thugs.
LanguageData.ProtectionFeeAgreeDialogue: The thugs from {0} seem happy with the deal and cut the communication.
LanguageData.ProtectionFeeDisagreeDialogue: The thugs from {0} seem happy about you refusing their offer and cut the communication right after assuring you that they cannot guarantee your safety.
LanguageData.DrunkMuffaloMessage: A small herd of muffalos have arrived in the area. It would seem they have found a secret stash of chemshine earlier, making them crave it even more. Watch out for their drunken shenanigans.
LanguageData.VFES_bringIngredientsDesc: Bring chemfuel to the chemsine barrel to start fermentation
LanguageData.VFES_cancelIngredientsDesc: Cancel bringing chemfuel to the chemsine barrel.
LanguageData.VFES_removeProductDesc: Remove chemsine from the chemsine barrel.
LanguageData.VFES_TargetDesc: The bounty target {0} has been located at this outpost.
